channel.title: Project "The New World" - Sumiagaming RSC [Must See]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/8831/sumiagaming2.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]~ Runescape [i]Classic[/i] ~[/center] [center]~ {S}hut {U}p {M}om {i} {A}m {G}aming ~[/center]
[center]~ Project "The New World" ~ [/center]
[i]Developers[/i] Ibcrootbeer Sumia
[i]Information[/i] This project is started because we've noticed theirs to many servers running the original RSC world. // So do we currently. We are designing a new world that is going to function as a new ''Game" running the RSC engine.
[i]This server will be a Better redo of the project below and this time we finish it[/i] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392500.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392500.0.html[/url]
[i]Previews[/i] Early alpha preview Enjoy, rate/comment. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LPXosvXZR44
-- More coming later.
Please leave comments below with suggestions and feedback.

item.title: Project "The New World" - Sumiagaming RSC [Must See]
item.dc:creator: @EndlessLife EndlessLife
item.description:
@EndlessLife wrote:

RSCShadow:

There’s no information here and the owner isn’t responsible enough to handle criticism properly.

Their hasnt been critism yet.
Only offtopic bullcrap.
And i uploaded a video for information.

Read full topic
item.source: Project "The New World" - Sumiagaming RSC [Must See]

item.title: Project "The New World" - Sumiagaming RSC [Must See]
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“dragonlord, post:21, topic:372000”][quote author=mapu link=topic=468059.msg3424568#msg3424568 date=1291795293]

Are people still living with their mom’s?

lol You’re all like 22. How sad.

What’s sad is how hypocritical you can be.

How so?

“I’ll bitch and cry when someone flames “last stand”, but it’s ok if I flame someone else”.

That wasn’t flaming. My comment was directed at the name of his server, not him nor anything about his concept/server.

Actually that was flaming. Clearly. I don’t get why you’re saying it’s not… It’s right there in front of you. Then again you might be as retarded as everyone says you are.

“my comment was directed at the name of his server”
“not him or anything about his concept/server”

You will shit bricks when you see it.

Thanks for putting in the effort but it’s clear that i’m still right in saying “how so?”.

I was making my comment regarding the naming chosen for the server, not the concept/server (in other words the overall goal/features/implementations of the server) The name has nothing to do with that, clearly the name of the server ‘to you’ means every aspect of the server in general.

Smart one.

Roflpwned.

You’re only mad because I corrected you in your geminus thread. Don’t take it to heart, it was nothing personal, I think you’re a nice person.
[/quote]

Remember when Tewl was running google and the mods/admins were changing posts on the forums? Remember you changed my post -.-

You’re a piece of shit, but I think you’re a nice guy.

Btw, been around this stuff as long as you have been, just lost interest about 2 years ago and decided I should come back :)[/quote]
Erm we changed posts as a joke, in a joke thread. Can’t believe you hold a grudge from two years ago.

Read full topic
item.source: Project "The New World" - Sumiagaming RSC [Must See]

Smart one.

Roflpwned.

[/quote]

Remember when Tewl was running google and the mods/admins were changing posts on the forums? Remember you changed my post -.-

You’re a piece of shit, but I think you’re a nice guy.

Btw, been around this stuff as long as you have been, just lost interest about 2 years ago and decided I should come back :)[/quote]

He’s delusional. Lol.

@Intoxication wrote:

[quote=“mapu, post:16, topic:372000”][quote author=Intoxication link=topic=468059.msg3424257#msg3424257 date=1291776752]

Are people still living with their mom’s?

lol You’re all like 22. How sad.

What’s sad is how hypocritical you can be.

How so?

“I’ll bitch and cry when someone flames “last stand”, but it’s ok if I flame someone else”.

That wasn’t flaming. My comment was directed at the name of his server, not him nor anything about his concept/server.

Actually that was flaming. Clearly. I don’t get why you’re saying it’s not… It’s right there in front of you. Then again you might be as retarded as everyone says you are.

“my comment was directed at the name of his server”
“not him or anything about his concept/server”

You will shit bricks when you see it.
[/quote]
Thanks for putting in the effort but it’s clear that i’m still right in saying “how so?”.

I was making my comment regarding the naming chosen for the server, not the concept/server (in other words the overall goal/features/implementations of the server) The name has nothing to do with that, clearly the name of the server ‘to you’ means every aspect of the server in general.

Smart one.[/quote]

Must be tough trying to climb out of that hole you’re in. You’re also delusional, because nothing that I’ve said suggested that I meant “in general”, I simply repeated what you said and put it in bold so you could see it too - It’s kinda like your “I wasn’t flaming” argument when clearly you were. I guess being around Ecko and Old Rsc Player has taken it’s toll on you.

Read full topic

item.title: Project "The New World" - Sumiagaming RSC [Must See]
item.dc:creator: @EndlessLife EndlessLife
item.description:
@EndlessLife wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]~ Runescape Classic ~[/center]
[center]~ {S}hut {U}p {M}om {i} {A}m {G}aming ~[/center]

[center]~ Project “The New World” ~ [/center]

Developers
Ibcrootbeer
Sumia

Information
This project is started because we’ve noticed theirs to many servers running the original RSC world. // So do we currently.
We are designing a new world that is going to function as a new ''Game" running the RSC engine.

This server will be a Better redo of the project below and this time we finish it
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392500.0.html

Previews
Early alpha preview Enjoy, rate/comment.

–
More coming later.

Please leave comments below with suggestions and feedback.

Read full topic
item.source: Project "The New World" - Sumiagaming RSC [Must See]
